attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the basicSystemInfo instance.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: Model name of this storage system. This value comes from the model attribute of the system resource.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of this storage system. This value comes from the name attribute of the system resource.

attributes.name: softwareVersion
attributes.description: Software version of this storage system. This value comes from the version attribute of the installedSoftwareVersion resource.

attributes.name: apiVersion
attributes.description: Latest version of the REST API that this storage system supports.

attributes.name: earliestApiVersion
attributes.description: Earliest version of the REST API that this storage system supports.
